title: A Treatise of Human Nature
sourceDesc: The first two Books of Hume’s [Treatise of Human Nature] were published together in 1739. The third Book, which included an Appendix making some changes to Book 1, was published in 1740. There was only one edition published in Hume’s lifetime, an this edition is therefore our copytext.

author: David Hume

blocks.content: £5 A £5 £1 TREATISE £1 £6 OF £6 £2 Human Nature : £2 £5 BEING £5 £4 An ^Attempt^ to introduce the experimental Method of Reasoning £4 £6 INTO £6 £2 MORAL SUBJECTS. £2 ""_Rara temporum felicitas, ubi sentire, qu{ae} velis_ ; _& qu{ae} sentias, dicere licet._ [^Tacit.^]""
